text:
Hi all,
quick question, how are you guys being informed about errors? You can catch them and they are being logged, but not everyone has the time to regularly check if something went wrong. We thought of sending ourselves an e-mail that included the logged error message / the function in which the error happened.

There is a "send internal email notification" block in the workflow, is there a way to make use of it in a repository / sdk?

Looks like the DM search bar is all jacked up. If you type at a normal typing pace it disregards your search and deletes your input. You need to type one letter, wait for it to search, then type the next letter. Very annoying for a search that already is a pain to use and typically returns far too many unrelated items.
This is the search bar in question.
I had this too, very annoying.
